content: मनीषिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मनीष-इनि] {@--1@} Wise, learned, intelligent, clever, thoughtful, prudent; <ls>R. 1. 25.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Praying, praising. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A wise or learned person, a sage, a paṇḍit; माननीयो मनीषिणां <ls>R. 1. 11</ls>; संस्कारवत्येव गिरा मनीषी <ls>Ku. 1. 28</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">5. 39</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 44.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A singer, praiser.
